name: Space Rescue (dwajdy)
description:
Help our little alien escape!

Help the poor little alien avoid being hit by asteroids, and collect on the way, floating diamonds to buy cool head coverings. There are more than 25 different hats that you can get!

You can enjoy the humble space casino to make more diamonds that can buy you goods! and don't forget to check the daily task to win more!
This is a fast, easy and fun arcade game.

A Note from Developer

This game was released in 2014 to iOS/Android, and later was removed for lack of updates. This is an HTML5 version of that same version, but due to issues in converting to HTML5 game might have bugs and missing features which might be resolved at some point in the future.
